name: Team 25 - Viracocha
description:
Viracocha is damn crazy, finally whip as he is, whip to move, after you tell me it's obvious he has no legs ... True fan of Indiana Jones, he wants to retrieve an artifact that is at least the great-golden-hollow-sacred in an Inca temple to whip the best eggs of his life. And how can you help him? By solving the riddles that each room of the dungeon will offer you. Between action and puzzle game you will have to plan your future moves and then move to reach the treasure! The game planned for Super Nintendo will make you relive its colors with humor and madness!

From a puzzle game to a reaction and reflex game,  it is up to you to recover the sacred artifact.

To do this you will have to overcome the different rooms by tracing your path with your whip 

Game Designers

Stanislas Rado - Aloïs DEUGNIER

Game Programmers

Florian GOZARD - Franci ALGERA - Valentin HERNANDEZ

Game Artists

Kimberley Prunier - Jeanne Cabon - Rose Danel - Eliott PINEDA

Producer

Louis CHIFFOLEAU

This game was developed in 3 days for the Godfather Week at the IIM Digital School in Paris. We had a lot of fun working on this project, so we hope you'll enjoy it !
